Episodes.Title: Efectuar lo acordado
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
Episodes.Plot: The Professor recruits a young female robber and seven other criminals for a grand heist, targeting the Royal Mint of Spain.

Episodes.Title: Imprudencias letales
Episodes.Writer: David Barrocal, Javier Gómez Santander, Esther Martínez Lobato, Álex Pina (creator), Álex Pina, Pablo Roa, Fernando Sancristóval
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte, Paco Tous
Episodes.Plot: Hostage negotiator Raquel makes initial contact with the Professor. One of the hostages is a crucial part of the thieves' plans.

Episodes.Title: Errar al disparar
Episodes.Writer: David Barrocal, Esther Martínez Lobato, Álex Pina
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
Episodes.Plot: Police grab an image of the face of one of the robbers. Raquel is suspicious of the gentleman she meets at a bar.

Episodes.Title: Caballo de Troya
Episodes.Writer: David Barrocal, Javier Gómez Santander, Esther Martínez Lobato
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
Episodes.Plot: Raquel is adversely affected by a personal crisis with her ex-husband. The hostages are afraid of the sound of gunshots they heard. Thieves argue among themselves.

Episodes.Title: El día de la marmota
Episodes.Writer: David Barrocal, Javier Gómez Santander, Esther Martínez Lobato
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
Episodes.Plot: A sudden development in the investigation and a mistake made by one of the thieves confronts the Professor with a serious risk that could lead to his identity being revealed.

Episodes.Title: La cálida Guerra Fría
Episodes.Writer: Javier Gómez Santander, Esther Martínez Lobato, Álex Pina
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
Episodes.Plot: The problems inside and outside the National Currency and Stamp Factory are growing. The biggest robbery in history does not allow any mistakes and each time, the tension and fear is rising. What opportunities are there for everythin

Episodes.Title: Refrigerada inestabilidad
Episodes.Writer: Esther Martínez Lobato, Esther Morales, Álex Pina
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
Episodes.Plot: A new police plan will make Raquel enter the National Factory of Currency and Stamp, right at the peak of the biggest heist in history. Berlin will be responsible for being the most extravagant host that the inspector has ever seen.

Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte

Episodes.Title: El que la sigue la consigue
Episodes.Writer: Javier Gómez Santander, Esther Martínez Lobato, Esther Morales, Álex Pina (creator), Álex Pina, Pablo Roa, Fernando Sancristóval
Episodes.Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte, Paco Tous
Episodes.Plot: The professor talks with Raquel's mother on stressful conditions. Darphanede wants thieves to choose between money and freedom from the hostages.
